title: Person of Interest Season Finale Reaction - 5x13 'Return 0'
author: Just one more episode
comment: "everyone dies alone. but if you meant something to someone, if you helped someone, or loved someone, if even a single person remembers you, then maybe you never really die."
The machine was talking to itself on the recording, teaching it's own copy. Just wow.
but that episode hit me directly in the heart

This series was a real masterpiece. We get attached to the characters, we laugh with them, we cry with them ... Little by little they become like friends ...
The end of this series left a void in my life.
Person of Interest leaves a considerable void in my heart. The show has been such a ride. Also, I will miss watching your POI reaction videos. Team Machine forever!
description:
Person of Interest you will be missed!

I'm sorry for uploading late but I was busy packing!
The perfect ending for this amazing show. It has truly been a big part of my life and I will always remember it. 
I loved every single thing of the episode and of course now I must re watch it. 

I'm so glad there was Fusco to make me laugh even when I wanted to cry. And HAROLD AND GRACE. I was super happy for them. 
Also, the music. It was so on point.

Hope you enjoyed the finale too. It was a mess of emotions but I loved it. Thank you for watching!
